about_the_game:
You're starting your journey as an entrepreneur! You're opening your own shop! Oh how terrifying the future seems. Thankfully you're not alone, your Uncle Dirk is here to support you. But something doesn't seem quite right with him, he's got dollar bills in his eyes and a bit too big of a grin on his face. Though you're probably overthinking it, he's just here to help, right?

  • Story
You'll be starting at the bottom with a rundown shop which you'll slowly turn into a thriving establishment. Buy new items, hire a helping hand, or 2, OR 3! Tend to customers, stock shelves. All with a juicy story of betrayal layered on top.



  • Store Management
Alright it's time to get into the nitty gritty of it all. In Stock the Shelves you have one goal, KEEP CUSTOMERS HAPPY! That means no shelf can be left empty. You'll be spending your days running all around the store grabbing items and putting them on shelves. Each customer has a unique shopping list which MUST be fulfilled or they won't leave happily.



  • Angry Customers
When a customer can't find an item on their shopping list they can get real angry real fast. All hope is not yet lost though. You have one final chance to save this sale. If you manage to give them the remaining items on their shopping list in time before the timer runs out you'll turn an angry customer back into a happy one!



  • Restock Challenges
Stocking shelves is a tough task, restocking a shelf requires first completing a Restock Challenge. Each item you sell in your shop has a unique Restock Challenge. These can vary from a simple timed button press, to pressing a series of randomized inputs, or even requiring you pay attention to other elements such as the current time of day to complete the challenge correctly.



Other Neat Features
  • Customize: Change your shops look to match exactly what you envision.
  • Hire Workers: Hire a helping hand to keep your shop all stocked up.
  • Endless Mode: How long can you last when customers are rushing through the door and all the shelves are empty?! Challenge yourself to last for as long as you can in this high octane mode where you lose the moment a shopper gets angry!
  • Challenge Mode: Extra difficulty everywhere! Customers are as impatient as ever, shelves go empty faster, shoppers buy in higher quantities & restock challenges have gotten twice as difficult!

short_description: A Frantic Store Management Sim. Create the best shop you can imagine, then make it better! Manage, Upgrade, Keep Customers Happy, but most importantly STOCK THOSE SHELVES!
